professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in data management, database administration, and security roles. Skilled in maintaining data integrity, optimizing systems, and ensuring organizational efficiency.

key_responsibilities: Patrolling and inspecting premises to ensure security measures are in place.
Monitoring unauthorized persons and suspicious activities.
Checking for hazards and maintaining safety protocols.
Maintaining records and logs as required by procedures.
Securing guest room doors and ensuring access control.
Processing orders and scheduling appointments.
Corresponding with clients and ensuring accuracy.
Quality checking data entry in Salesforce.com.
Cross-referencing data across multiple databases.
Performing data collection and formatting for eligibility tracking.
Using Microsoft Excel for data analysis and reporting.
Conducting research on traffic safety and crash data.
Performing data entry into NDOT databases for analysis.
Assisting in the development of analytical reports.
Ensuring data integrity and accuracy across systems.
Developing VLOOKUP formulas and Pivot tables for reporting.
Processing large datasets for analysis and reporting.
Handling registration for events and meetings.
Managing membership fees and records.
Assisting with material distribution.
Using JD Edwards software for data management.
Creating charts and reports from databases.
Importing/exporting documents and records.
Building and maintaining databases using Oracle and Microsoft Access.
Recommendations for database structures
security protocols
and backup strategies.
Assisting in the administration of enterprise resource planning systems.
Supporting database queries and data analysis.

technical_skills:
Data Management",
            "Database Administration",
